reviews.review: as sweet as cake

The great start to the game called portal 2, a wonderful puzzle game with an old feel to it, it may have a bit of a slow story but when you get into it, this thing will twist your brain inside for you trying to find the answer to the puzzle.

Если вы еще ничего не знаете о мире Half-Life и Portal, то ни в коем случае не портите себе впечатление аннотациями и описаниями сюжета. Все, что вам нужно знать: вы участник эсперимента, и игра начинается с того, что вас будит милый компьютерный голос, сообщающий, что сейчас начнется тестирование. Ради прикола смойте в туалет окружающие вас вещи, и вперед, в этот короткий, но очень насыщенный "шутер"-головоломку.
Да, сюжет в этой игре незамысловат, но когда он откроется, то вы испытаете просто море удовольствия.
Отдельно хотелось бы отметить черный юмор, кажущуюся простоту, которая вскоре оборачивается прекрасной разминкой для ума (и при этом не заставляет вас разбивать клавиатуру об стенку в приступах ярости от невозможности пройти какое-то место), ну и ГЕНИАЛЬНУЮ, иначе и не скажешь, задумку с порталами.
Если вам понравилась игра, то обязательно купите и вторую часть. Она еще круче. В миллионы миллионов раз, хотя, казалось бы, куда :) Остается только мечтать, что Гейб Всемогущий вспомнит о существовании цифры три, и когда-нибудь мы увидим еще одну историю, наполненную компьютерным бормотанием Глэдос и прекрасными новыми головоломками.
This game was a revelation. Totaly new, non violent, funny, and yes there is a cake! A must for every gamer!
Maravilhoso, instigante e desafiador. Um dos melhores jogos de puzzle que já conheci.  Não perca a oportunidade de jogar este jogo inesquecível. Nota 1000!!!
ez game

Takes about 4  hours to complete and is well worth it. Due to art design choices this game has aged particularly well. Buy and then play this game in one session. The ending should put a smile on your face.
Tão bom quanto o 2, vale muito a pena jogar o 1 primeiro para acompanhar a história e o sarcasmo hilário dos personagens. Ótimo.

I bought this just to understand the cake joke.

I wasn't dissapointed.
Played this game through, and it's pretty fun.  Elaborate, challenging and creative all describe this game.  Worth a look at.

Amazing game. Futuristic Design, Awesome gameplay mechanics.

THE CAKE IS A LIE! (You sure?)

10/10

Portal had a very well done story line with good graphics, and it surprisingly worked well on my computer (my computer can barely run Garry's Mod anymore). I had lots of fun with the game, there were some difficulties, some parts took a while, but it was very good. I'd like to get Portal 2, the sequel to the game, but It costs about 10 bucks more than the first game and I don't have the requirements to have it on my computer. I've heard it has so much more and it has more humor and stuff. One of my favorite parts of the game was screwing around with the turrets. They are so funny to mess with! In the chamber where you first encounter the turrets, I literally put all the turrets in the chamber, every cube, every object (not counting the ones outside of the chamber) right next to the fizzler and I just put in everything one at a time!
My Official Rating: 10/10
Valve Classic

Portal, o que dizer? Se você ainda não conhece eu tenho duas cores para te dizer: Azul e Laranja, pronto, tá aí, o jogo te mostra o que fazer, é puzzle em cima de puzzle em cima da história, resolva-os, acompanhe uma das melhores histórias de todos os tempos e continue testando!
puzzling...
Really fun, works great on budget laptops, and has a great story. It might get boring if you play it for too long. It also might be frustating, but this one is more obvious then the 2nd one.
Very simple and original mechanic and super smartly done puzzles, with an engaging universe and villain.

This has to be one of the best games in existance. I love the physics and thinking you have to do to advance in the game, not to metonion the cynical jokes. This game is creepy, funny, and awesome all in one, I definetly recommend this to any of you puzzle lovers out there!

So, this was the game that has finally got me into gaming. All my buddies said I would love it, and the were right. I had a blast! Fun, quirky game with some neat puzzles and twists. And hell, just getting the infinite falling loop is pretty fun for a little bit.
My only complaint/question. Are games usually this short? 4 hours worth on entertainment for $10... I'm not scoffing that much, but I was expecting a little bit more out of the game. Something I'm missing?

Portal - игра на все времена. Реалистичная физика, шикарная графика, Тортик который нам обещает GlaDOS, куб компаньон. Уровни в игре просто шикарные. На некоторых уровнях мне действительно пришлось долго думать, чтобы пройти к следующей главе. Незнаю как вам, но мне с самого начала показалось что весь этот огромный комплекс пустует, и складовалось ощущение безысходности и одиночества.

9 тортиков из 10

Short, sweet and solid. Portal is definately a game that is worth your $10.

This game turned out to be an amazing afternoon of fun. It really does make you look at your world through different eyes. I would love for everyone to be able to say they've played this at least once.

THE CAKE REALLY IS A LIE

Awesome game, hands down. If you haven't played it, play it. Puzzle game enthusiasts and non puzzle game enthusiasts are bound to love it. Great story, good sense of humour, an intriguing sense of ambiguity. There's a reason this game has such a big fanbase!
It's aite.
This game was a triumph. Valve should be making note here, this game is a huge success. It's hard to understate my satisfaction with this game.

There's something this game has that Portal 2 doesn't. Portal 2 is a masterpiece of a video game and will always go down as one of the greatest games ever made, but its original counterpart has something in it.

The original Portal has a charm the sequel doesn't. Its quiet yet tense and dreary atmosphere, the emotionless voice that slowly reveals more and more as you go on, the mysterious and surreal music... Portal does such a fine job for what it is.

Many people get tempted to skip Portal and go straight to its practically perfect sequel. For anyone considering to do that, please don't. Play Portal 1. Every single aspect of it is beautifully designed and skipping it would be a crime.

Un très bon jeu, le concept des portails est juste génial, j'ai fini le jeu d'une traite tellement j'étais pris dedans, puis depuis je le refais de temps à autres en essayant de le finir le plus vite possible, ce qui n'est pas si facile... Le scénario est bon, la jouabilité est bien gérée, la musique est agréable... C'est un sans-faute!
This game is amazing! Great graphics and story.
If you like Portal, you will love the sequel 10 times more.

Acabo de terminar Portal en la aventura normal, sin niveles avanazados ni desafíos. Pese a su corta duración (3 horas en mi caso), debo decir que se trata de una obra maestra en cuanto a diseño de niveles. Considero que no es necesaria una enorme inteligencia para superar los puzles, sino que cuenta más valerte de tu propia intuición y seguir adelante. 100% recomendable y espero que la segunda parte sea más larga.
Interes......
플레이 타임은 짧지만 2를 생각하면 상당한 떡밥이다

Mix in one testing facility, a psychotic robot, a mysterious protagonist, add a dash of portal hopping through deadly and dangerous training grounds, and you've got yourself an excellent deliciously moist cake. Or do you...?

Portal came out in late 2007 featuring an incredibly awesome ending song you've got to hear. The game begins with you (The female protagonist only known as Chell.) awakening from your slumber pod in a confined room. After some brief learning of the controls you are introduced to a strange voice known as GlaDOS (Genetic Lifeform and Disk Operating System) that leads you through a series of tests with the promise of cake at the end. As you progress through the series of tests you come to realize things are not as what they seem. Oh and you get an amazing gun you can use to create portals (One blue, one orange.) that you can traverse in addition to carrying objects through.

The entire game focuses around puzzle solving, using the Portal Gun to access an otherwise impossible area or jump in one at the bottom of a pit and fling yourself out of the other at a high velocity. From moving "cubes" from one area to activate a switch to supplying power to another switch via an electric ball soaring through the air. Portal takes a good amount of problem-solving but won't really leave you scratching your head for long to figure out how to reach an out-of-reach platform.

In general the game is somewhat short, taking about 3-4 hours, maybe less for some. Using the Portal Gun can be pretty fun from launching yourself across a pool of acid to sneaking up behind a turret. Or even placing a portal above a pool of acid and slapping another right beneath the turret watching it plummet down below. All the while GLaDOS will comment (and eventually mock) on your progress until the final showdown. I don't want to spoil anything so I will leave it there.

Controls can be a little awkward if you are using a controller (Yes, the game does support gamepads.) as there are no controls for sensitive sticks. Personally I found myself slowly sliding to the left with my 360 controller ever so slowly and the same effect with the camera. It could just be my controller but options to adjust the dead zone on a gamepad would be nice. Trying to grab an object can be a little annoying sometimes as it won't immediately register unless you're at the right angle.

Music and sound wise the game is great. Nothing truly memorable (Except the final ending song, "Still Alive".) but it can set the mood quite nicely. Graphics are a bit dated but that's to be expected for something dating back from 2007. Speaking of graphics at startup I did run into a slight issue, The game started in full screen 1280x720 according to my monitor but the screen remained blank. After some searching around it turns out to get it to work you neeed to add "-windowed" to the properties string in Steam. After that you can go into the settings and tweak it as much as you like and switch back to full screen. Just a tip in the event you find your screen blank but the music plays.

Portal does end in sort of a cliff hanger but fortunately Portal 2 is out which continues the story. If you're new to the Portal games I strongly recommend starting with the first game before trying the second. I got both on sale during the Steam Winter Sale so if you have the chance be sure to get both of them. The first does have map challenges and achievements I have yet to try after beating the story so there is bound to be a lot of replay value for your buck.
Menu text don't show up in linux mint 17. Evan I set language to English. Really want to play this game after I finsh Portal 2...

스팀을 하면서 아직도 이 게임을 안해봤어요?

스팀의 핵심 아닌가요?!

Bem, Portal é basicamente um jogo de puzzles. Esse gênero nunca foi bem explorado pelos desenvolvedores, então, a Valve resolveu mudar isso radicalmente. Você é Chell, um mulher muda, e você está nas instalações do laboratório Aperture Science. Lá, você conhece GLaDOS, uma inteligência artificial sádica e sem dúvidas nenhuma, a personagem mais marcante dos dois jogos da série. GLaDOS coloca você nos mais variados locais de teste, e, para te dar um ajudinha, te dá uma Portal Gun. Nesses ambientes de testes, você começa a perceber o sadismo de GLaDOS, e se dá conta que ela pode estar tentando te matar. E aí, começa a sua jornada em busca de se livrar dessa IA tão carismática. Os gráficos de Portal são muito bons, como era de se esperar da Source Engine, e a sua física e fantástica, beirando os níveis da perfeição. A história é empolgante e contagiante, te fazendo ficar preso nas poucas horas que você joga, pois Portal tem uma campanha muito curta, podendeo ser concluído em até uma hora e meia. Conta também com uma jogabilidade muito intuitiva e fácil de ser assimilada. Em uma breve síntese desse jogo fantástico, posso dizer que Portal inovou o gênero puzzle em videogames e se tornou um ícone entre os gamers com seus mais diversos elementos e particularidades. 8,5/10
This game was really fun, and I really enjoyed it, though I felt like it didn't take that long for me. It's cheap, and really fun, so I would totally reccomend it.

Don't know why it took me so long to actually get around to playing this but it was great.

Sure, its a little short but it felt substantial.

Also, Best. Ending. Credits. Ever.

10/10 Would watch credits again.

Ideias genias de historias geniais e tudo oque mais for genial está contido nesse jogo. Sendo revolucionario por trazer o elemento de puzzle a niveis bem interessantes, Portal te faz ficar imerso dentro do proprio mundo. Grandes personagens e com bom graficos não te deixam na mão. O unico problema é que a campanha é curta e para passar os bonus se torna algo repetitivo.

9/10
Great game with a different story, however it was shorter than I expected. Bought it on offer and was worth it at that price

Bądźmy szczerzy: Portal nigdy nie miał być najważniejszym składnikiem The Orange Box. I mało kto przypuszczał, że będzie tak dobry. Zwłaszcza tak rewolucyjny dla gier logicznych,  mało kto wierzył w sukces Portala,  a jednak się udało. Cała akcja gry rozpoczyna się w jednej z komur testowych w której nasza bochaterka wychodzi ze stanu hibernacji.  Znajdujemy się w "Aparature Labolatories" które znajduje się gdzieś w U. S. A. w stanie Mishigan.   Portal jest grą w której wcielamy się w obiekt testowy który nazywa się Chell.  Wszystkich informacji na temat bochaterki dowiadujemy się właśnie od maszyny która żądzi całym kompleksem a w grze dowiadujemy się że nazywa się GLADoS. Maszyna wykorzystuje nas do testowana komur .  W zamian chce nam dać kawałek ciasta.  Jednak gdy ukończymy wszystkie testy które zleca nam GLADoS to zsmiast nam dać kawałek ciasta to usiłuje nas zabić! Jednak Chell udaje się uciec z rąk maszyny i ucieka pustymi korytarzami laboratorium aby uciec z Aparature Sciencen. Daje nie chcę opisywać rozgrywki ponieważ nie chcę spojlerować rozgrywki,  itak wystarczająco dużo powiedziałem o fabule gry. Portal ma również tryb przechozenia komur testowych na czas! Ponadto gra ma włączone zdobywanie osiągnięć, oraz obsługę kontrolerów! Ja jako doświadczony informatyk,  oraz gracz polecam tą grę. Zaraz po zakończeniu tej części polecam przejść część 2.  Tam dzowiecie się o całej histori Aparature Laboratories! 

Pozdrawiam:  Marcin

Why it took me so long to finally play this I have no clue. I just keep on passing it up thinking I'll do it when I have time. I wish I did it sooner. I'm so late to this party! (get it? sorry, I'm starting on Portal 2 immediately.) The robot narrator is funny, clever gameplay mechanics and deeply satisfying ending. Plus the most enjoyable end credits- you have to finish the game it so worth it. Most lovable villain I ever encountered. It's like an evil Tachikoma.
One of the best games I've ever played. The sequel is even better.

The game portal is yet another good game released by my favourite company valve it is a very good puzzle game that is easy enough for you to not get stuck somewhere but it is also hard enough for you to not pass one level in 3 seconds.Portal has also a very complex,deep story,i can't say much about the story i do not wanna spoil anything.I am putting a 9/10 it is a very good game,close to perfect to be honest but 1 point is taken because the game is too short i beat the hole thing in like 1 afternoon

Info k recenzi- nevím proč, ale nejdřív jsem hrál Portál 2, takže jsem tím mírně ovlivněn a nejspíš to budu porovnávat s druhým dílem, což se může na konečném hodnocení dost projevit,.

A nyní už k recezni,. 
Portál je jedna z nejlepších a nejúžasnějších logických her, které jsem kdy hrál,. Toto se vztahuje i na druhý díl, který je taktéž skvěle zpracován! Do hry vás vtáhne dějová smyčka (jelikož nejsou ve hře české titulky, tak je to trochu složitější,. Ale nemyslím si, že by to bylo až tak složité,. Jsem průměrný angličtinář a s pochopením jsem neměl moc velký problém,. Jistě, jsou tam slovíčka, které jsem si musel přeložit, ale myslím si, že jsem to zvládl,. :D ), černý humor úmělého počítače (který celou labratoř má na starosti), "propracované úrovně" (v uvozovkách je to protože znám druhý díl, na svou dobu, kdy hra vyšla, tak jsou určitě úrovně dobré, ale jelikož jsem hrál nejdříve druhý díl, tak mi jednička přišla nějaká snazší, zasekl jsem se pouze u jedné místnosti, kde jsem opravdu nevěděl),.

Malinko něco o dějové linii,. 
Probudíte se v Aperture Science Enrichment Center (laboratoři),. Chvíli tápete v paměti, kde jste a proč tu jste,. Najednou se ozve nějaký hlas- GLaDOS (již zmíněný "super počítač"), který vám vysvětlí proč tu jste, co tu dělate a hlavně co budete dělat,. Jelikož GLaDOS má rád testy, tak vám jich pár připravý,. (-doslova jen pár! Oproti druhému dílu je to opravdu málo!) Testy byste samy nezvládli a proto vám GLaDOS pomůže a dostanete (nevybavuji si název ve hře, ale všem vám znamý název) PortalGun,. Pomocí tohoto přístroje můžete vytvářet dva portály a skrze ně procházet,.
 Za odměnu, že budete dělat testy vám GLaDOS slíbí, že dostanete dort,. Samozřejmě je tu jedno ALE! Když se dostanete nakonec, tak žádný dort nedostanete,. :( [spoiler] A aby toho nebylo málo, tak se vás GLaDOS pokusí zabít,. [/spoiler] 
 To se vám samozřejmě nelíbí a tak se snažíte utéct ve zdravý pryč z laboratoře,. Jak to vše dopadne? To abyste věděli, tak si už budete muset zahrát,. :P :D 

Portál bych řadil do jedné z těch lepších her,. Pobaví, soundtrack je naproso úžasný a strašně mile mě překvapil, příběh je taktéž lepší- na to, že je to logická hra, je pžíběh opravdu úžasný! (Byť např. na TWD nebo The Wolf among Us to nemá, ale to budou zase nějaké mé komplexy,. :D )

+ GLaDOS- (abych to uvedl na pravou míru- její hlášky! Opravdu jsem se někdy popadal za břicho, protože je to něco úžasného! ) - jedny z nejlepších hlášek, co jsem kdy prostě viděl!
+ soundtrack - opravdu velké plus za takovýhle úžasný soundtrack! Smekám!
+ příběh - skvěle zpracovaný příběh! Jak jsem říkal, na to, že tato hra má plnit funkci logickou, tak má naprosto úžasný příběh,-
+ originalita
+ hratelnost, jednoduché naučit

- herní doba - myslím, že jsem an to v úvodu nenarážel, byť toto mě velmi mrzelo! Opravdu neskutečně krátká herní doba, hned když jsem to hrál prvně, tak má herní doba trvala asi necelé 2 hodiny, což mě velmi překvapilo a mrzelo,. A jelikož jsem hrál druhý díl, kde to bylo delší, tak mě to velice překvapilo a zklamalo,.
- opravdu jednoduché místnosti - nevím, zda to má co dočinění s tím, že jsem opět hrál nejdřívě druhý díl a až potom první, ale jakmile jsem přišel do místnosti, tak mi došlo, co musím/měl bych udělat,. To prostě ve dvojce neexistovalo, tam jsem přišel a opravdu velmi dlouho jsem dumal, co musím udělat,. Beru to jako velké mínus! :(

Portál bych určitě ke koupi doporučoval, ale určitě né za plnou cenu,. (nyní 6,99€ - osobně si prostě myslím, že si to za tu herní dobu a opravdu velmi jednoduché místnosti nezaslouží) Kupoval jsem hru ve slevě, asi okolo 2-3€ a to si myslím, že by dnešní době odpovídala,. Rozhodně tím ale nechci hru nijak snižovat, myslím si, že Portál je opravdu skvělá hra! 

8/10
I feel dumb playing this game, but somehow I can't get enough of it.

四苦八苦しながら、ナントカ 12 時間ちょいでクリア。（まだボーナスチャプター等は手付かずですし、最後の一歩手前で完全に詰まり、一ヶ所攻略動画を観てしまいましたが…懺悔。）

Antes de este juego, yo era un jugador de battlefield, call of duty, y alguna q otra cosa más.
Después de Portal..... Me comenzé a interesar en serio por los videojuegos. y los buenos de verdad.
En mi opinion, uno de los mejores juegos jamás creados, Portal logra captar la escencia del puzzle más "básico", y mezclarlo con la historia más "básica". Pero logra un resultado complejo, con un universo detrás.
Me encantó su humor negro, su villano (en mi opinion el mejor villano que he visto), los retos, su universo, su dificultad (puede llegar a darte un buen dolor de cabeza), su... todo.
Te enganchará al primer momento. Aunque no muy largo, lo disfrutarás cada segundo. 
Eso sí, píllalo con la secuela. para tener la experiencia completa.

100% absolutely needed for the Portal 2 story. You can have this one and not Portal 2, but you can't have Portal 2 without Portal.
Absolutely fantasic game! Both fun to solve test chambers and listen to the hilarious stuff that GlaDOS says! Would definately recommend you play this game once to see what it's like!

Portal

You wake up in a room as a test subject to be forced by an artificial intelligence name G.L.A.D.O.S. to perform various tests to examine humans and how they react in various situations.
The game focuses on puzzle solving, and after learning the test chambers I finished the whole game in 30 minutes or less.
Nonetheless, it's an innovative game.

I wanted this game for a while, but I wasn't sure if I should get it. I heard that it was too easy and too short. In the main mode, that's true. But in my opinion, the heart of the game is the challenge mode. There are a variety of challenges and advanced maps. They are MUCH more challenging.

Also, it's the funniest game ever. That counts for something.
A very amusing and interesting game. Unlike anything I have played before.

Kupiłem tą grę z resztek PSC, była wtedy przeceniona. Jako iż z bratem graliśmy w tą grę na XBOX360, sceptycznie podeszłem do zagrania w wersję komputerową. Po przegraniu kilku godzin mogę stwierdzić że polecam tą grę fanu logicznych zagadek, (szczegołnie dziecom, wyjaśnienie poniżej), oraz posiadaczu słabego komputera. Tylko tyle. Nie dość że gra jest obrzydliwie krótka, oraz fabuła nie powala (bo praktycznie takowej nie ma), to w dodatku zadania są na tyle proste że rozwiązałby je pięciolatek.

Bit short campaign but great game, enough said.

They have told me I'd enjoy Portal. In fact, I did. I've never played a puzzle game of this kind, so it was something new for me.
The plot is very well done. I wouldn't say it's amazing, but still, it was surprising at every level (or at least every 3 levels)
The graphics were really nice despite of when it was released (2007) (In fact, Portal 2 looks almost the same. Almost. Of course, 4 years are noticed)
GLaDos (I still don't know where the caps go xD) is the best "evil" I've ever seen (well, mostly heard). His sense of humour is unique. As well as its freakin' speech. Really amazing. And the end. Oh, you will love the end.
The voice acting was nice too, but, well, GLaDos is the only one who talks. You are mute, I guess, since I didn't hear the main character's voice in the whole game. And the final song, the end song. It's simply amazing, astonishing and wonderful.
And the puzzles. There are easy ones. And there are difficult ones. But the average is quite easy. (Still, some of them took me a few minutes more than others)

So, there are only pros. Nope. Only one negative thing: is a bit short. Yeah, I finished it in 2,2 h. And I repeated a few puzzles since I died many times. You can say I didn't enjoy the game. But I really did. It's a bit short, that's all. But it's great.

I do reccomend this game.

9.7/10 (-0,3 for the shortness ;)

PD: Written by a non-native english speaker.

PD2: I forgot to say that the game it's not worth 7 €. Too short for that price. I reccomend to wait for a sale, huge or normal. I bought it at 1,74€.

Preso nel bundle con il seguito, Portal è un gioco particolare con un gameplay semplice ma soddisfacente e una trama particolare che si svela pian piano.
Ci ritroveremo ad impersonare una ragazza che, guidata da quello che sembra un computer, armata di una pistola in grado di aprire portali, dovrà attraversare diverse stanze con la risoluzione di svariati enigmi in stile platform.
La difficoltà aumenta a seconda dei progressi nel gioco, ma non sarà mai frustrante e vi permetterà di godervi l'ambientazione asettica e inquietante e la trama che, seppur lenta, saprà tenervi con il fiato sospeso fino alle ultime battute del gioco.

Scommessa vinta dalla Valve, che crea una piccola perla nel vasto mondo dei videogiochi.
Is a very good game and i love it. I love Portal <3 . 11/11
Oyun biraz tuhaf :D ama zevkli oyun sizi sürüklüyor.

It's a bit short, but this doesn't matter because all other features make you forget about this fact. The game, the plot, the graphics, the movements, the puzzles... everything is perfect.

An amazing game, totally recommendable... and it's possible to play it on Linux!

Thank you VALVE :)
"The candle that burns twice as bright must burn half as long." And so portal is a brief but amazing experience.
Das Spiel ist zwar sehr kurz aber trozdem sehr gut. Wenn man spaß an Puzzlespielen hat muss man dieses Spiel gespielt haben.
很有意思的解谜游戏，最后boss战很有新意。
Fantastyczna

Muy buen juego es cierto que la trama es bastante corta pero para la epoca q salio es bastante buena.
Simple, sencilla y buena.

Great game, great concept, great humor.
Catched it on sale (with the second that now i will play) and were all money well spent.
Probably cause of the longevity it don't worth 7 euros, but on sale is a must

10/10

Really enjoyed the game. Great game play and nice puzzles. Not too taxing so you can work out how to complete the level after a few tries.
Its quite a short game and completed it in just over 3 hrs without rushing it.
However given the price, would recommend it.
faboulous game with a mysterious and gripping sstoryline 9.9/10

Portal, and Portal 2 should be in every self respecting game enthusiasts stash. Period. Puzzles and Strategy par excellence! Really unlike any other game in its day. One of my favorite strategy games next to Myst/Riven/Pilot Wings from halcyon days of console and pc games. Don't buy this game if you don't want to exercise some of those brain cells. Here you must think things through. And, the banter (taunting?) is worth the price of admission alone.
love it so much my friends recomended it to me so i got the portal bundle its awsome i just dont know how to get any bonus maps
Awesome. That's the word.
The idea it's brilliant, and the irony throughout the game takes it to another level. Graphics are cured.  Shame it's quite short, but i'm looking forward to play number 2.

J'ai acheté le pack Portal 1 & 2, je ne connaissait pas trop vu que je ne suis pas un gros joueur. Tout simplement énorme, par contre il faut commencer par le 1 sinon on prend l'histoire en cour de route c'est pas génial.
Au niveau graphisme le 1 & le 2 se valent donc pas dutout déçu par l'achat du pack.

A avoir dans sa bibliothèque.
In my opinion, one the best games ever made. It is a lesson of game design.
Збс игра,но вторая чать мне больше понравилась.
Para los amantes de los puzzles no duden en comprar este y la segunda secuela!
This is a fun game but test chamber 18 can be a pain at times. I love were they were going with this concept and i loved it all the way threw!
El sistema de portales y su empleo se explica de forma excelente con todos y cada uno de los acertijos disponibles.  9/10

Portal shines in the department of uniqueness.  Its twist on science and reality subtly immersed me.  Every level was well-crafted and caused me to stop and think many times.  This game has the most memorable villain I've ever "killed" in a video game.  Portal had me laughing throughout the whole playthrough.  You may feel more satisfied if you play this masterpiece while eating cake.  10/10
